settings.title: 15 minutes a day to absolute joy!
settings.text: The mat is designed such that it can be used in a sleeping or sitting position. It activates pressure points that help you relax throughout the day. Use it for as little as 15 minutes a day to relieve yourself of stress, moodiness, and insomnia in the long term.

settings.title: 300% higher pressure and 50% water saving
settings.text: This unique shower has two sides which can be used for different purposes. The pressure mode offers up to 300% higher water pressure. Moreover, both sides are designed with a mechanism that can save 50% more water than regular showers.

settings.title: The Safest Pocket Bag Ever
settings.text:
Put all your important documents, electronic devices, and personal accessories in the bag and they are assured to be secure while you travel.

The bag stays in the front within your vision so when you are walking on a dark street or riding the train during peak hours, you do not lose anything to pickpockets. Moreover, you can put on a coat over the bag for extra safety.

settings.title: Efficient Aerodynamic Design
settings.text: The antenna creates a statement of its own on any car it goes over. Its aerodynamically pointed shape cuts air just like a shark fin and minimizes wind resistance. The shape also ensures that signal is not lost at any point of time.

settings.title: All types of Clothes
settings.text: The dual action hot and cold technology is the fastest, easiest, and safest way to dry your delicate clothes. The dryer quickly and safely dries your clothes right on the hanger. The air compressor sucks in air from the surroundings, heats it up to 60° and uniformly blows it towards your clothes.

settings.title: Use it anywhere you wish
settings.text: This outstanding magnetic cable features a 360 degree rotating magnetic port which is convenient to use from any angle. This makes it easy for you to use it at home, office, car, or anywhere else you wish. The magnetic head ensures that it does not fall off from the phone no matter how it is placed.

settings.title: Extremely easy to use
settings.text: The bite reliever is designed to be user friendly and has a simple operation so anyone can use it in times of pain and irritation. Simply activate it, place it over the swollen area on the skin, and let it do its job in a matter of just a few seconds!

settings.title: Sleep in any position
settings.text: Whether you are a side or a back sleeper, this pillow allows you to be in any position while also eliminating forward head posture and irregular neck curve. This ensures that you are comfortable but not unknowingly hurting yourself.

settings.title: Drives water away from the face
settings.text: The shape of the shower cap has grooves which drive water away from the face. This makes your child feel comfortable with falling water and let you easily wash their hair.

settings.title: Quintessential combination of ingredients
settings.text: The skin cleaner consists of not only one but four enriching ingredients which contribute to cleaning up your skin. The sea salt fights skin problems caused by mites while goat's milk and oleic acid keeps the skin moistened and glycerin is always ready to fight all acne-related issues.

settings.title: Resistant against all liquids
settings.text:
The t-shirt is resistant against water, coffee, tea, milk, and carbonated beverages. This makes it highly useful for traveling or hiking where you might encounter such liquids without the possibility of washing it.

Due to its repellent nature, it also stays clean for an extended period of time. The water resistance is also beneficial for keeping you dry during periods of physical activity.

settings.title: Practical for Daily Use and Traveling
settings.text:
Derived from reliable user research, the pockets of the bag have been geometrically shaped to fit modern essentials including smartphones, tablets, earphones, wallets, sunglasses, travel documents, and what not.

This makes it perfect to take along whether you are commuting to work or going on a holiday. Its water-repellent material prevents your belongings from accidental spills and rain.

settings.title: Simple Installation
settings.text:
The task of installing this antenna is not daunting and can be done by hand or with commonly available tools.

The process is as simple as unscrewing the old antenna, connecting the wire, and sticking the shark fin with the provided sticker. The installation can be done in less than a minute.

settings.title: Effective pressure points
settings.text: The material of the stimulators is finely chosen to be effective without being painful. The distribution of the stimulators is uniform throughout the back and works irrespective of your resting position.

settings.title: Functionality at its best
settings.text: The cap contains various buttons which can be used to adjust its size to fit your child's head. The ultra-soft EVA material makes the shower cap dry quickly by letting all water slide away. Hang it anywhere in the bathroom using the circular hole after you are done using it.

settings.title: 3 ports in one!
settings.text: The cable is available with 3 different heads - Android, iPhone, and Type-C. You can choose the one supported by your phone. The ports are very easy to snap on as they have a magnetic attachment point which locks perfectly into place every single time.

settings.title: 100% safe for children
settings.text: It functions solely on the basis of vibration and heat such that it is completely safe to be used both by adults and children. The easy one-button operation makes sure that anyone can quickly benefit from it when it is needed the most.

settings.title: 2 spraying modes
settings.text:
The two sides of the shower can be used for two different modes - Spa mode and Pressure mode.

The Spa mode provides a soft yet turbulent flow of water which helps you relax every single muscle in your body. The Pressure mode is suitable for daily showers and really wakes you up in the morning.

settings.title: See real change within days
settings.text: The improvements in the skin complexion and texture are very visible with the skin cleaner. After a few uses, the roughness blends away and new bright and clear skin takes its place giving you a refreshing look.

settings.title: Nano level liquid isolation technology
settings.text:
The fabric is isolating in nature and forms a liquid-repellant layer when it encounters any type of liquid molecules. Though the fabric is hydrophobic, it lets sweat pass to the outside.

This keeps odor away from accumulating and makes the t-shirt perfect for wearing during hot weather or for any kind of sports.

settings.title: Finest material for maximum comfort
settings.text: The pillow uses memory foam and is extremely smooth to touch while providing the necessary rigidity for good sleep. It includes a removable cover that is washing-machine friendly.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: Dry your clothes faster than ever and never iron your shirts again because the Giravo Smart Clothes Dryer does it all for you! Simply hang your shirts or skirts on the dryer and let the magic begin. You will have nicely ironed clothes.

settings.title: Micro-fiber Cloth Heads
settings.text: The finest micro-fiber cloth is used to make the cleaning heads of the product. They do not harm any lenses, leave zero traces, and thus prevent any harm to your eyes. Since they are stored inside a cap, the cloth itself does not get contaminated.

settings.title: Comes with inbuilt LEDs
settings.text: It comes with inbuilt LED beads which make it handy to set up a photo studio anywhere. You wouldn't have to hassle with separate light bulbs as this compact light box is truly a fantastic combination of functionality and portability.

settings.title: Works on all grill materials
settings.text: Whether you have porcelain, cast iron, steel or any other modern grill grates, this barbeque brush works perfectly over them. Without causing any damage, it leaves the grill shiny and hygienic for your next barbeque.

settings.title: High quality construction
settings.text:
The brace is fitted with a high grade carbon steel spring which is able to take loads up to 44 lbs (20 kg) and reduces the vertical stress exerted on your knees. It also stabilizes the knee cap and eases out pain related to patellar tendonitis. 

The brace comes in one size that fits different leg sizes with its adjustable straps. It is very easy to put on and can be comfortably worn for hours at a stretch.

settings.title: Accelerate Recovery & Reduce Risk
settings.text:
Proven to accelerate the recovery of injured athletes and enables a smoother return to usual training schedules. 

The unique design of The Knee Support Belt ® reduces the risk of repeat injuries and strains by stabilizing the knee joint and reducing pressure throughout the musculoskeletal system of the knee.

settings.title: Ultra-fine nail patterns
settings.text: Use this glowing nail powder to create ultra-fine patterns that will steal the attention of everyone around you. Its 'glow in the dark' feature is a conversation started for low-light parties. The powder sticks well enough to last any long event you wish to attend.

settings.title: Convenience at its maximum
settings.text: Now you don't have to run to the store when you run out of power. Plug your rechargeable battery into any USB port or power bank and it will be ready to use in a matter of 2 hours. These batteries will never let you down in case of an emergency.

settings.title: Completely underwire free
settings.text: The bra has a front row which replaces the need for an underwire. Underwires have been proven to adversely affect the breasts if worn for extended periods of time. This bra is not only more comfortable but also healthier for the long term.

settings.title: Available in your favorite color
settings.text: The shoe bag does not fail to impress as it is available in multiple colors, one of which will surely suit your needs. From a light gray shade to a funky wine red, suit yourself with a color that matches your personality (or shoes!).

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: Quickly terminate itches and irritation from mosquito bites using the Giravo Mosquito Bite Reliever! No more worrying about getting bit by insects as this bite reliever eases out pain and reduces swelling at the same time. It delivers heat and vibration to the swollen area to provide a soothing effect.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: This outstanding magnetic cable with LED is an amazing addition to your mobile phone accessories! It features breathing lights which guide you to your phone at night and indicate how much charging is complete. The magnetic head offers much higher comfort than regular fixed cables and is bound to give you a superior feel.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: Make your child happy, healthy, and hygienic by using this shower cap for regular baths! It is designed to ensure that no water or soap enters children's eyes when you wash their hair and they can take refreshing baths while absolutely enjoying them.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
If you are looking for an innovative pillow that takes care of your sleep by supporting your head, neck, and spine in the correct position, the Therapeutic Posture Pillow is the perfect choice for you!

It has won multiple awards and has been recognized as 'Product of the Year' due to its high effectiveness in improving the sleep of so many people around the world.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: Do you go often to the gym or enjoy doing sports? This hydrophobic t-shirt is designed to keep you dry and smelling great as you focus on your game. Its fabric is made using nano-technology and engineered to let sweat pass out rapidly and will let you unleash your best performance.

settings.sub_desc2: We offer a 1-year limited warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee.

settings.main_desc: Orders are processed securely in USD. No additional fees are charged.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: The ultimate solution for clear, pimple-free, and bright skin is here! The Sea-Salt Skin Cleaner removes acne, blackheads, large pores, and keeps your skin completely oil free. Moreover, it contains a moisturizer which makes the skin soft, smooth, and shining bright.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
The Giravo High Pressure Shower is the first ever shower that increases water pressure 3 times and saves water while doing so!

It comes with an adjustable shooting area with an extremely powerful shooting ability and a clever double sided design.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
Giravo Relax is a special acupuncture mat and pillow designed to get rid of all the stress from your body as you rest.

If you sleep restlessly, feel irritable or moody, or are generally stressed, this product with its widely appreciated naturopathy method can do wonders for you in a very short time!

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
The Car Shark Fin Antenna is a fantastic way to add a stylish touch to your car while keeping the functionality of the antenna intact.

With this shark fin antenna, you can make any car look modern and enjoy the good old FM radio at the same time.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
With plenty of fashion and design awards, our Personal Pocket Bag stands on top of our line of latest fashion accessories.

Comfortably carry it everywhere and have your personal belongings within the reach of your arms at all times.

settings.title: Pocket-friendly and Stylish
settings.text: If you use any kind of glasses, this is a product that you’d like to carry everywhere. That’s why we made it stylish with various color options and compact such that it fits in any of your pockets, be it your jeans or your bag.

settings.title: Recommended By Experts
settings.text:
The Knee Support Belt ® is an orthopedic breakthrough recommended by Doctors and Physiotherapists around the world for the dramatic impact it has on the lives of their patients. 

From sufferers of degenerative conditions to injured athletes The Knee Support Belt ® assists in living a life free from persistent pain and injury.

settings.title: Designed to support various knee movements
settings.text:
The design of this brace is such that it does not restrict any knee movement but indeed makes it easier. It supports the knee when bent at the time of sitting and provides extra support while getting up. 

It reduces stress on the ligaments and minimizes the chances of a knee strain injury. The open knee cap enables air flow and provides additional comfort.

settings.title: Cleans easily with steam
settings.text: The brush requires nothing more than steam to clean your barbeque grill! Just fill water into the grill brush, turn its knob on, and run it over a pre-heated grill. The water rapidly turns into steam as it absorbs heat and in turn removes residual food and grease from the grill.

settings.title: Unbelievably easy to set up
settings.text:
You just have to go through 3 simple steps to get this light box ready to use. It couldn't have been thought to be any easier than this.

First, expand the studio tent by pulling on both sides. Then, open it vertically until you hear a snap sound. Lastly, connect the power supply and place your article inside.

settings.title: Minimalist and classy design
settings.text: With the functionality of carrying multiple shoes, the essence of this bag is still minimal and gets the job done. Its simple design and use of solid colors makes it look classy in any scenario.

settings.title: Available in various shades
settings.text: Moreover, this special bra is available in various colors that you can choose from. Buy your favorite colors or stock up on multiple shades for special occasions. After all, you will never want to go back to your underwire bras.

settings.title: Use in any device!
settings.text: The use of these batteries is just like standard AA batteries with an added functionality of USB recharging. You can use them in any electronic device ranging from remote-controlled cars to professional microphones. Due to their high reliability, they have gained the trust of customers around the world.

settings.title: Extreme glow in all colors
settings.text: This nail powder has been designed to have the maximum glow possible in such a tiny space. Every color is bright enough to be seen from a distance of many meters and will not disappoint you. The finest of patterns are designed to have an equal visible distance to a nail full of glowing color.

settings.title: Extremely easy to wash
settings.text: The hydrophobic fabric has an added benefit of making the t-shirt extremely easy to wash. It does not let oil or grease stick and immediately lets it get washed away when dipped in water.

settings.title: Combats problems anywhere on the body
settings.text: As this skin cleaner is in a soap bar form, you can use it not only on your face but anywhere you face similar problems. The most common use is on the back where a lot of people face recurring acne problems that can totally vanish after using this skin cleaner.

settings.title: Inbuilt soap mixer
settings.text: The shower head has an exceptional feature to internally mix soap with water. Simply rotate and remove the central portion, drop in your favorite liquid soap, and get uniformly mixed foamy soap water from your shower. This is an excellent add-on for using this shower in a bathtub.

settings.title: Beautifully crafted stimulators
settings.text: The Giravo Relax mat is crafted with hundreds of lotus stimulators, each of which has more than 25 pressure points. They have been scientifically designed and placed in an arrangement that contours perfectly to your body.

settings.title: Convenient to carry anywhere
settings.text: The dimensions of the bite reliever are no more than that of a standard plastic ruler. It fits in all bags and purses so you can conveniently carry it when you go outdoors the next time. The compact size also makes it ideal to be carried while traveling over long distances.

settings.title: Color options to suit your taste
settings.text: This charging cable is not only a functional product but also comes with a style quotient. It is offered in 3 colors which you can choose to match your phone or personal style. The glowing LED of the cable enhances the aesthetics of the colors even further.

settings.title: Convenient to carry anywhere
settings.text: Shower caps are an important accessory while traveling with a child. The material of the shower cap is flexible and can be folded down along any axis. This is extremely useful to pack it in your travel bag.

settings.title: Designed to combat sleep-related problems
settings.text:
The ergonomics of the therapeutic pillow are designed to provide a stable and comfortable sleeping position throughout the night. This helps tremendously with posture-related problems like sleep apnea, chronic neck pain, and spinal pain.

The overall size of the pillow is only 30 x 50 cm which makes it easy to carry it while traveling especially if your pain doesn't allow you to use other pillows.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: This special bra has won many awards in the past years and has changed the look of the undergarment industry. It has gone against traditional bras by eliminating the need for underwires and offers comfort and support to millions of women across the globe.

settings.title: Award Winning Design
settings.text: These newly launched shoe bags are fresh in the market, have a highly functional use, and are especially convenient during traveling. Not only do they look great but also make you ultra-efficient while on the go.

settings.title: Award Winning Design
settings.text:
The Giravo Professional Light Box is a unique portable photo studio that can be used to shoot breathtaking pictures of products and accessories.

It is compact in size and can be set up anywhere within minutes. It comes with super bright LED beads which make the background perfectly white or the color you desire.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: The Grill Steam Cleaning Barbeque Brush is an excellent way to take care of the most annoying part of having a barbeque, cleaning! This brush, with its award winning design, makes your cleaning task much easier due to its simple water-based functioning and quick cleaning ability.

settings.title: Compact Size and Multiple Colors Available
settings.text:
The total length of the antenna is only 17 cm from front to back. Being less than 7 cm in height, the antenna does not stand out alarmingly over the car.

It is available in multiple colors to match your taste and the color of your car. The minimalistic design and the right color choice can completely change the look of your car.

settings.title: Premium Materials for the Smallest Details
settings.text: No stone has been left unturned in designing this bag as the finest premium materials have been handpicked for the details like buckles and zippers so you can enjoy truly premium quality. All the components work together seamlessly to provide you the best experience of using the bag.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: This Ultrafine Fluorescent Nail Powder is the highest quality of glowing nail powders out there. You can use it both on finger and toe nails to give them a really cool shine in the dark, perfect for any party!

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text: This unique rechargeable AA battery comes with a built-in USB that can be used to replenish its power! This saves you money from buying new batteries each time they are drained. It also reduces waste in the landfill while providing a simple solution for all your battery-operated devices.
This Week: FREE Shipping Worldwide!

settings.title: State of the art knee brace
settings.text:
If you want the maximum level of protection for your knees without compromising on your comfort level, this joint support knee brace is the perfect product for you.

It is made using state of the art technology and works as both a preventive and remedial measure for various injuries related to the knee.

settings.title: Award Winning Design
settings.text:
The Knee Support Belt® is the first ever knee support device that stabilizes the entire knee joint by compressing the patellar tendon. 

Thanks to its award winning design degenerative joint disease sufferers and injured athletes can alleviate pain and accelerate recovery.

settings.title: Award Winning Product
settings.text:
If you wear eyeglasses or sunglasses, you will wonder why you did not come across this fantastic product earlier! Always keep your glasses crystal clear without the trouble of keeping clean lens-cleaning cloths or the risk of scratching them.

Did you know that having dirty lenses can drastically weaken your eyes without you even noticing? This is reason enough to take care of all your glasses with this specially invented cleaning device.

settings.title: Even Dries Your Shoes
settings.text:
Not only can it be used to dry clothes, but also to dry shoes by adding a dedicated attachment. Simply connect the provided attachment, slide it into your shoes, and start drying!

It your shoes within a matter of a few hours, which otherwise takes days! Moreover, the attachment can also be used to dry the thickest of your socks.

settings.title: About Giravo
settings.content:
Here at Giravo™ we love to create high quality products that make an impact in people's lives.


Have a question? Contact us

(2,321 Reviews)

settings.title: Sign up for our newsletter
settings.content: And be the first to receive exclusive discounts and new product releases.

settings.text:
+ Where can I buy Giravo™ Products? 

Giravo™ products are exclusively available through this online store. That's how we can guarantee the best price - and cut out unnecessary margins for middlemen that raise the retail price.

+ What about shipping costs and returns? 

We offer FREE shipping worldwide, with tracking number. Returns are accepted within 30 days after you receive your order. 

We offer a 1-year limited warranty.

settings.title: Equipped with everything you need
settings.text: This product comes along with everything you need to apply it. You can use the variety of 12 different colors to make any pattern you can imagine. Many patterns are also provided in the package which you can use to get outstanding results.

settings.title: Revolutionizing the battery industry
settings.text: More than 15 billion alkaline batteries are thrown away into landfills each year creating an enormous waste of resources. This rechargeable battery is a supremely eco-friendly alternative as it can be used hundreds of times without throwing away.

settings.title: 300% more support than conventional bras
settings.text: Even without any underwire, this bra provides more than 3 times the support of a traditional bra. This has been made possible using exclusive materials and an innovative design with a front row cross. This support offers a nice fit and an extra lift which women really love!

settings.title: Travel in style with this clever shoe bag
settings.text: The design of this shoe bag is distinctive. It has two compartments for shoes on the top side and one on the bottom. This clever touch lets you carry 3 pairs of shoes effortlessly without worrying about the extra space and weight in your main luggage bag.

settings.title: Compact yet powerful
settings.text:
It is ultra-compact to carry as it folds down into a small size. It measures approximately 9 inches in all directions when completely open.

The cuboid space created by the three sides makes it perfect for placing small items inside to photograph them. The bright LED beads are powerful enough to light up the product and the background to their highest brightness.

settings.title: Drastically different results
settings.text: You are bound to observe a visible change right after you use the barbeque brush for the first time. It cleans the grill effectively and removes residues letting the fire burn brighter, higher, and stronger.

settings.title: One solution for all your knee problems
settings.text:
No matter what knee problem you are facing, this brace assures that your knees remain in the most suitable position for recovery. It provides wholesome support to the knee while allowing movement with its flexible construction. 

You can put on this knee brace if you want to prevent injury during a sport or right after you start experiencing any kind of pain. It applies restoring forces that make you position your knee perfectly every time you walk or move your leg.

settings.title: Smart Support & Enhanced Mobility
settings.text:
Specifically designed to support injured athletes and sufferers of arthritis, degenerative conditions, chondromalacia, Osgood-Schlatter's disease and other painful knee conditions.

The Knee Support Belt ® can enhance your everyday quality of life and improve day to day mobility.

settings.title: Automatic Drying & Ironing
settings.text:
The smart dryer puts the power of a conventional dryer in the palm of your hand. In the form of a clothes hanger cleverly integrated with a dryer, it can dry upto 5 kg of clothes at once.

The clothes dry in Warm Air Mode for 3 hours followed by the Cold Air Mode. This procedure removes all wrinkles and absolutely eliminates the need for ironing!

settings.title: Simple and Effective
settings.text: The working of this product is simple yet gets the job done. With a two-headed micro-fiber cloth design, both the sides of your lenses are cleaned simultaneously and thoroughly. Just a few runs over the entire lens renders it dustless and free of finger prints.
